Message.Msg: Disastrous results - like the housing and subprime loan crisis. That was a Bill Clinton/Barney Frank generated crisis. We had 5% unemployment during Bush's tenure as President. All the Democrats want is to deny the right to vote to service people by invalidating mailbags full of absentee ballots because of an incorrect date stamp on the bag. Keep those republican troops from voting. Besides Obama approved of George Bush's stupid bank bailout, never closed the prison in Cuba and follows plenty of other Pres. Bush's policies such as extending the war in Iraq a few years.
Still always good for a laugh whenever I see an old goldenFoul post,,,, HAR!!

I voted for him, but there are plenty of people voting for Obama . don't count your chickens. This election determines whether we remain a capitalist country or not and become insolvent. Even if Romney is elected we could see be insolvent.
